body_text:
Good news! 
Your custom-made cover is in our queue to be made.
You will receive an automated email very soon with a tracking number if you haven't already.

When a tracking # is issued, that means the cover is in our queue to be made and will be ready to ship soon. 
It can then take 24 - 48 hours from when it is issued to when the cover will be picked up, scanned and updated on the USPS/UPS/ or FEDEX website. 

This timing does not include holidays or weekends. However, it can also be updated before that as well.

If you‚Äôve received a previous email from us confirming size & customization options and you have not responded,  we encourage you to still do so, ASAP.  Especially if there is something wrong with the information we have. Thanks!

We're glad we could help. If there are any problems at all with the cover, please contact us. We'll take care of you.

It has been a pleasure.

Marc Stuart
Gig Gear Covers

body_text:
Good news! 
Your custom-made cover is in our queue to be made.

You will receive an automated email very soon with a tracking number if you haven't already.

When a tracking # is issued, that means the cover is in our queue to be made and will be ready to ship soon. 

It can then take 24 - 48 hours from when it is issued to when the cover will be picked up, scanned and updated on the USPS/UPS/ or FEDEX website. 

This timing does not include holidays or weekends. However, it can also be updated before that as well.

If you‚Äôve received a previous email from us confirming size & customization options and you have not responded,  we encourage you to still do so, ASAP.  Especially if there is something wrong with the information we have. Thanks!

We're glad we could help. If there are any problems at all with the cover, please contact us. We'll take care of you.

It has been a pleasure.


Marc Stuart
Gig Gear Covers

body_text:
Hello Kenneth Rothfield:

Let us know if this all looks correct.

All of our covers are custom-made upon placement of an order. Please review the following information:

Fender Bassman 410 Neo Enclosure
Fabric: Premium Synthetic Leather | No Padding
Color: Pitch-Black

Measurements: 
Width: 26"
Depth: 16.25"
Height: 24.5"


Side Amp Handle Measurements:
9"H X 7"W
The center of the handle is located down 6" from the top of the amplifier.
The center of the handle is also offset 8.75" from the rear side panel of the cover.

Zipper Handle: No
2-in-1 Pick-Pocket: No
Priority Shipping: No

We use the manufacturer's information to custom-make your cover upon order. If anything looks wrong or you have concerns after you receive the item, please reach out to us.

Sincerely

Marc Stuart
